ch0021_80_green/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey! I was looking forward to seeing you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Heh, you look ready
to take on the world and get stronger!
ch0021_80_green/7101_0701_01_10:
If you wanna know my origin story, I could
probably sum it up in one word—Red!
ch0021_80_green/7101_0701_02_10:
I set off on my journey to complete my Pokédex
at the same time as him. We’ve been rivals
ever since!
ch0021_80_green/7101_0701_03_10:
What’s your origin story like? Looking back on that
can be important, you know.
ch0021_80_green/7102_0701_01_10:
Not to brag or anything, but I actually became the
Champion of the Indigo League back in Kanto.
ch0021_80_green/7102_0701_02_10:
Though...I lost to Red right after, so people started
calling me the phantom Champion...
ch0021_80_green/7103_0701_01_10:
This Aerodactyl of mine has kept things exciting
ever since we met!
ch0021_80_green/7103_0701_02_10:
I mean, he was regenerated from amber! Doesn’t
get much cooler than that!
ch0021_80_green/7103_0701_03_10:
Aerodactyl is ferocious, so he’s always ready for a
good fight. All he wants to do is battle, day in and
day out!
ch0021_80_green/7104_0701_01_10:
This outfit I’m wearing is similar to the one I wore
when I first started out on my Pokémon journey.
ch0021_80_green/7104_0701_02_10: Not bad, right? I still rock the look, if you ask me!
ch0021_80_green/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are there any
Trainers you’re hoping to be like someday?
ch0021_80_green/7105_0701_02_10: If not, you should try to be like me! I’d be perfect.
ch0021_80_green/7105_0701_03_10:
’Cause I’m cool and reliable! Oh, and don’t forget
that I’m pretty much the strongest there is!
ch0021_80_green/7105_0701_04_10:
There’s no way you’ve already found someone
better. Trust me.
ch0021_80_green/1701_0701_01_10: Hey! Got a present for ya!
ch0021_80_green/1701_0702_01_10: Have fun with it! Smell ya later!
ch0021_80_green/2501_0701_01_10:
As you already know, I’m the most powerful
Trainer in the world! And of course, my partner
Pokémon is also number one!
ch0021_80_green/2501_0701_02_10:
Aerodactyl can keep up even with the harshest
training I throw at him! He’s the strongest in
the universe!
ch0021_80_green/2501_0702_01_10:
Aerodactyl really sees Red’s Charizard as his rival.
Whenever they see each other, you can see
sparks fly!
ch0021_80_green/2501_0702_02_10:
He really hates losing and just goes for what he
wants. So he’s the same as me.
ch0021_80_green/2511_0701_01_10:
There are a whole bunch of strong Trainers
here on Pasio. Once in a blue moon, even I
sometimes lose.
ch0021_80_green/2511_0701_02_10:
That reminds me of all the times I lost to Red
back in Kanto...
ch0021_80_green/2511_0701_03_10:
He was always stronger whenever I saw him...so
I did everything I could to keep up with him.
ch0021_80_green/2511_0701_04_10:
I guess that’s why the two of us are as strong as
we are now!
ch0021_80_green/2511_0702_01_10: When I was Champion and lost to Red...
ch0021_80_green/2511_0702_02_10: it taught me what it really means to lose.
ch0021_80_green/2511_0702_03_10:
But my guess is you already know something that
important, huh?
ch0021_80_green/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. How you feeling?
Me? I’m feeling great. Thanks for asking!
ch0021_80_green/3003_0701_01_10:
Bonjour! Off for an adventure?
That’s fine and all, but don’t forget to have
a battle with me from time to time!
ch0021_80_green/3005_0701_01_10:
You’re still adventuring at this hour?
I think I’m gonna call it a day myself.
Smell ya later!
